issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When a boto call below is made,

user_data = self.conn.get_instance_attribute(self.instance.id, 'userData')

, AWS returns

{u'userData': None}

while Eucalyptus returns

{}

Related to the ticket: 

https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/browse/GUI-1238
fields.summary: Eucalyptus instance's empty user data attribute returns a different value than AWS

comments.body:
The response now always includes a userData element when the user data attribute is requested:

{code}
#
# euca-describe-instance-attribute --debug --user-data i-049fe7ff
